name: Far Eastern Federal University Virtual Expo
name_original: Far Eastern Federal University Virtual Expo
description:
Russia's largest Federal University in the Far East now in VR!

We welcome you to Russian Island!
A huge land mass located just on the edge of Vladivostok connected to Russia with the largest bridge in the Far Eastern Federal District. The new education cluster is home to the campus of the largest University beyond the Ural mountains.

Medicine and beyond!
The huge education cluster, is also the location of a state of the art Medical Center, with research and medical facilities.

Take a look around and get to know the university, campus life and medical research facilities in this virtual reality experience!
